definition: injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc
to fall/to tumble/to trip/(of prices etc) to drop/Taiwan pr. [die2]
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)

sentences.english: Yunnan Baiyao (white medicinal powder) is exceptionally effective for the treatment of fracture, injury, etc.
sentences.chinese: 雲南白藥對跌打損傷等許多病痛都具有神奇療效。

pinyin: feng1 shi1 xing4 guan1 jie2 yan2

definition: disorder of internal organs caused by overexertion
bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
